CustomField.description: Check the checkbox if you want to track that the Service Delivery benefit applies to the entire household. If the Service Delivery only benefits the individual Contact, leave checkbox unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check the checkbox if you want to track that the Service Delivery benefit applies to the entire household. If the Service Delivery only benefits the individual Contact, leave checkbox unchecked.
CustomField.label: Household Benefit
